title: So yeah..Ekko..the time rewinder champion...

embed.description: The newest Champion sneak peek from Riot Games at the MSI 2015 Finals. Ekko looks super awesome. Reminds us of Tracer (Overwatch) or Chronos (Smite) with the rewind ability.

body: GG Leagues is officially broken. A champion who can reverse time non stop to make his team win is just what we needed. RIP any skills required, just pick Ekko and you will auto-win because unlimited rewind OP. Got ganked and nearly died? REWIND! Enemy jungler tries to come at you a second time but you get out just in time thanks to Ekko. Your team walked into a brush with all 5 enemy players waiting? REWIND! Safety first. Your team got a few seconds too late to dragon? REWIND! Enemy team now ace'd. #LeagueofNoSkills.
